alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 1:56PM EST until December 23 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In New York, Yates, Steuben, Schuyler and Chemung counties. In Pennsylvania, Bradford, Wyoming, Lackawanna, Luzerne, Pike and Southern Wayne counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 5 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and scattered power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will cross the region on Friday. A lull in the winds may occur Friday morning, but winds will pick up again after frontal passage and shift to the southwest.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Lackawanna; Luzerne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Wyoming
